00035 std::vector<int> affx::file5_dims(int d0) {
00036   std::vector<int> d;
00037   d.push_back(d0);
00038   return d;
00039 }
00040 std::vector<int> affx::file5_dims(int d1,int d0) {
00041   std::vector<int> d;
00042   d.push_back(d0);
00043   d.push_back(d1);
00044   return d;
00045 }
00046 std::vector<int> affx::file5_dims(int d2,int d1,int d0) {
00047   std::vector<int> d;
00048   d.push_back(d0);
00049   d.push_back(d1);
00050   d.push_back(d2);
00051   return d;
00052 }
00053 std::vector<int> affx::file5_dims(int d3,int d2,int d1,int d0) {
00054   std::vector<int> d;
00055   d.push_back(d0);
00056   d.push_back(d1);
00057   d.push_back(d2);
00058   d.push_back(d3);
00059   return d;
00060 }

00062 void affx::file5_dims_hsize_copy(std::vector<hsize_t>& dst,const std::vector<int>& src)
00063 {
00064   dst.resize(0);
00065   //
00066   for (int i=0;i<src.size();i++) {
00067     dst.push_back(src[i]);
00068   }
00069 }

00073 affx::File5_dtype_t affx::as_file5_dtype(affx::tsv_type_t tsv_dtype)
00074 {
00075   switch (tsv_dtype) {
00076   case affx::TSV_TYPE_UNKNOWN:
00077     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_UNKNOWN;
00078     break;
00079   case affx::TSV_TYPE_ERR:
00080     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_ERR;
00081     break;
00082   case affx::TSV_TYPE_STRING:
00083     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING;
00084     break;
00085   case affx::TSV_TYPE_INT:
00086     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT;
00087     break;
00088   case affx::TSV_TYPE_FLOAT:
00089     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT;
00090     break;
00091   case affx::TSV_TYPE_DOUBLE:
00092     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE;
00093     break;
00094   default:
00095     FILE5_ABORT("Unhandled case.");
00096     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_ERR;
00097     break;
00098   }
00099   //
00100   FILE5_ABORT("Unhandled case. (default didnt catch it.)");
00101   return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_ERR;
00102 }
00103 
00104 // Cant say this as the type_ids arent the  same.
00105 //  if ((hdf5_dtype==H5T_STD_I32LE) ||
00106 //      (hdf5_dtype==H5T_STD_I32BE)) {
00107 //    return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT;
00108 //  }
00109 affx::File5_dtype_t affx::as_file5_dtype(hid_t h5_dtype)
00110 {
00111   //dump_h5_dtype(h5_dtype);
00112 
00113   H5T_class_t dtype_class=H5Tget_class(h5_dtype);
00114   int dtype_size=H5Tget_size(h5_dtype);
00115 
00116   //
00117   if (dtype_class==H5T_INTEGER) {
00118     if (dtype_size==4) {
00119       return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT;
00120     }
00121     if (dtype_size==2) {
00122       return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT;
00123     }
00124     if (dtype_size==1) {
00125       return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR;
00126     }
00127   }
00128   else if (dtype_class==H5T_FLOAT) {
00129     if (dtype_size==4) {
00130       return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT;
00131     }
00132     if (dtype_size==8) {
00133       return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE;
00134     }
00135   }
00136   else if (dtype_class==H5T_STRING) {
00137     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING;
00138   }
00139 
00140   //
00141   FILE5_ABORT("affx::as_file5_dtype(): cant map h5_dtype.");
00142   return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_ERR;
00143 }

00147 hid_t affx::as_hdf5_dtype(affx::tsv_type_t tsv_dtype)
00148 {
00149   return as_hdf5_dtype(as_file5_dtype(tsv_dtype));
00150 }
00151 
00152 hid_t affx::as_hdf5_dtype(affx::File5_dtype_t file5_dtype)
00153 {
00154   switch (file5_dtype) {
00155   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING:
00156     //assert(0);
00157     break;
00158   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR:
00159     return H5T_NATIVE_CHAR;
00160     break;
00161   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT:
00162     return H5T_NATIVE_SHORT;
00163     break;
00164   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT:
00165     return H5T_NATIVE_INT;
00166     break;
00167   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT:
00168     return H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT;
00169     break;
00170   case affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE:
00171     return H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE;
00172     break;
00173   default:
00174     FILE5_ABORT("Unhandled type.");
00175     break;
00176   }
00177   //
00178   FILE5_ABORT("internal error! shoudnt be reached.");
00179   return H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE;
00180 }
00181 
00182 hid_t affx::as_h5t_native_type(hid_t dtype)
00183 {
00184   int d_class=H5Tget_class(dtype);
00185   int d_size=H5Tget_size(dtype);
00186 
00187   // translate to native types.
00188   if (d_class==H5T_INTEGER) {
00189     if (d_size==4) {
00190       return H5T_NATIVE_INT;
00191     }
00192     if (d_size==2) {
00193       return H5T_NATIVE_SHORT;
00194     }
00195     if (d_size==1) {
00196       return H5T_NATIVE_CHAR;
00197     }
00198   }
00199   else if (d_class==H5T_FLOAT) {
00200     if (d_size==4) {
00201       return H5T_NATIVE_FLOAT;
00202     }
00203     if (d_size==8) {
00204       return H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE;
00205     }
00206   }
00207   // cant convert this to H5T_NATIVE_*
00208   return -1;
00209 }

00213 void affx::dump_h5_dset(hid_t dset_id,std::ostream& ostm)
00214 {
00215   ostm << "dset_id=" << dset_id << " --";
00216   if (dset_id>0) {
00217     //
00218     hid_t dspace_id=H5Dget_space(dset_id);
00219     FILE5_CHECKID(dspace_id,"dump_h5_dset");
00220     affx::dump_h5_dspace(dspace_id,ostm);
00221     H5Sclose(dspace_id);
00222     //
00223     if (0) {
00224       hid_t dtype_id=H5Dget_type(dset_id);
00225       affx::dump_h5_dtype(dtype_id,ostm);
00226       H5Tclose(dtype_id);
00227     }
00228   }
00229   else {
00230     ostm << "  invalid";
00231   }
00232   ostm << "\n";
00233 }

00235 void dump_h5_dims(int ndims,hsize_t* dims,std::ostream& ostm)
00236 {
00237   ostm <<"(";
00238   for (int d=ndims-1;d>=0;d--) {
00239     if (dims[d]==H5S_UNLIMITED) {
00240       ostm << "*";
00241     }
00242     else {
00243       int x=dims[d];
00244       ostm << x;
00245     }
00246     if (d!=0) {
00247       ostm << ",";
00248     }
00249   }
00250   ostm << ")";
00251 }
00252 
00253 void affx::dump_h5_dspace(hid_t dspace_id,std::ostream& ostm)
00254 {
00255   ostm << "dspace_id=" << dspace_id << " -- ";
00256   if (dspace_id>0) {
00257     if (H5Sis_simple(dspace_id)) {
00258       int ndims=H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims(dspace_id);
00259       hsize_t dims[20];
00260       hsize_t dims_max[20];
00261       //
00262       H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dspace_id,dims,dims_max);
00263       //
00264       dump_h5_dims(ndims,dims,ostm);
00265       ostm << "--";
00266       dump_h5_dims(ndims,dims_max,ostm);
00267       //
00268       int npoints=H5Sget_select_npoints(dspace_id);
00269       if (npoints>=0) {
00270         ostm << "points=" << npoints;
00271       }
00272       //
00273       int nblocks;
00274       switch (H5Sget_select_type(dspace_id)) {
00275       case H5S_SEL_ALL:
00276         ostm << "{all}";
00277         break;
00278       case H5S_SEL_HYPERSLABS:
00279         nblocks=H5Sget_select_hyper_nblocks(dspace_id);
00280         if (nblocks>0) {
00281           hsize_t blocksize[2];
00282           char str_buf[100];
00283           ostm << "{";
00284           for (int b=0;b<nblocks;b++) {
00285             H5Sget_select_hyper_blocklist(dspace_id,b,1,blocksize);
00286             sprintf(str_buf,"%d:%d",int(blocksize[0]),int(blocksize[1]));
00287             ostm << str_buf;
00288             if (b<nblocks-1) {
00289               ostm << ",";
00290             }
00291           }
00292           ostm << "}";
00293           break;
00294         default:
00295           break;
00296         }
00297       } // switch
00298     }
00299     else {
00300       ostm << "not simple";
00301     }
00302   }
00303   //printf("\n");
00304 }
00305 
00306 void affx::dump_h5_dtype(hid_t dtype_id,std::ostream& ostm)
00307 {
00308   ostm << "dtype_id=" << dtype_id << " -- ";
00309   if (dtype_id>0) {
00310     switch (H5Tget_class(dtype_id)) {
00311     case H5T_INTEGER:
00312       ostm << "int";
00313       break;
00314     case H5T_FLOAT:
00315       ostm << "float";
00316       break;
00317     case H5T_STRING:
00318       ostm << "string";
00319       break;
00320     case H5T_VLEN:
00321       ostm << "vlen";
00322       break;
00323     default:
00324       ostm << "???";
00325       break;
00326     }
00327     ostm << ":";
00328     //
00329     switch (H5Tget_order(dtype_id)) {
00330     case H5T_ORDER_LE:
00331       ostm<<"LE";
00332       break;
00333     case H5T_ORDER_BE:
00334       ostm<<"BE";
00335       break;
00336     default:
00337       ostm<<"???";
00338       break;
00339     }
00340     //
00341     char buf[100];
00342     sprintf(buf,"%4dB",int(H5Tget_size(dtype_id)));
00343     ostm << buf;
00344   }
00345   else {
00346     ostm << "invalid";
00347   }
00348 }

00350 std::string affx::file5_dtype_to_string(affx::File5_dtype_t dtype)
00351 {
00352   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR) {
00353     return "char";
00354   }
00355   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT) {
00356     return "short";
00357   }
00358   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT) {
00359     return "int";
00360   }
00361   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT) {
00362     return "float";
00363   }
00364   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE) {
00365     return "double";
00366   }
00367   if (dtype==affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING) {
00368     return "string";
00369   }
00370   return "unknown";
00371 }
00372 
00373 affx::File5_dtype_t affx::file5_string_to_dtype(const std::string& str)
00374 {
00375   if (str=="char") {
00376     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR;
00377   }
00378   if (str=="short") {
00379     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_SHORT;
00380   }
00381   if (str=="int") {
00382     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT;
00383   }
00384   if (str=="float") {
00385     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT;
00386   }
00387   if (str=="double") {
00388     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE;
00389   }
00390   if (str=="string") {
00391     return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING;
00392   }
00393   //
00394   return affx::FILE5_DTYPE_ERR;
00395 }
